name: Alchemy Help
description:
Alchemy help is a program to help you with the game Alchemy. Sometimes you just need a little help to figure out the next tier of items. This program shows you what it takes to make an item and also what that item helps to make. Use as much or as little as you need.

Please let us know if you have any feedback (web@lajdesignsw.com). Thanks


This was designed for Alchemy by Zed. Some of the other Alchemy's might have other combinations not included. Email us any that you find are missing.
